endColor.description: The color at the animation end

fadeDuration.description: The fadeIn duration in seconds. Requires `isLoaded` toggled to `true` in order to see the transition.

fitContent.description: If `true`, the skeleton will take the width of it's children

isLoaded.description: If `true`, it'll render its children with a nice fade transition

startColor.description: The color at the animation start
